abstract.text: This extension makes Color conform to Codable.
It encodes the color as a string in the format “red;green;blue;alpha”.
It decodes the color from a string in the same format.
A purple color that automatically adapts to the current trait environment.
A pink color that automatically adapts to the current trait environment.
The color for content layered on top of secondary backgrounds of your grouped interface.
A color that simulates the appearance of the color for a person with protanopia.
Protanopia is a type of red-green color blindness that affects the perception of red light.
A color that simulates the appearance of the color for a person with deuteranopia.
Deuteranopia is a type of red-green color blindness that affects the perception of green light.
The color for placeholder text in controls or text views.
An overlay fill color for large areas that contain complex content.
A yellow color that automatically adapts to the current trait environment.
The color for borders or divider lines that hides any underlying content.
A fifth-level shade of gray that adapts to the environment.

The color for links.
A color that simulates the appearance of the color for a person with tritanopia.
Tritanopia is a type of blue-yellow color blindness that affects the perception of blue light.

The color for text labels that contain primary content.

The color for content layered on top of the main background of your grouped interface.

This extension makes Color conform to Codable.
It encodes the color as a string in the format “red;green;blue;alpha”.
It decodes the color from a string in the same format.
